about.title: About 24Toolkit
about.subtitle: Your all-in-one free online toolkit powered by AI and open web technology
about.missionDesc: 24Toolkit was created to provide everyone with free, powerful, and easy-to-use online tools. Whether you're a student, professional, developer, or creative, we believe essential utilities should be accessible to all without barriers, subscriptions, or complicated interfaces.

features.fastDesc: All tools run directly in your browser with instant results. No waiting, no uploads to servers.
features.privacyDesc: Your data never leaves your device. Everything processes locally for maximum privacy and security.
features.openDesc: Built with modern web standards and open-source technologies that work across all devices.

differences.noSignupDesc: Jump straight into any tool without creating an account or providing personal information.
differences.aiPoweredDesc: Leverage cutting-edge AI technology for text summarization, code explanation, image captions, and more.
differences.alwaysFreeDesc: All tools are completely free with no hidden costs, premium tiers, or feature limitations.
differences.crossPlatformDesc: Works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with responsive design.

about.aiToolsList: Text Summarizer, Paragraph Rewriter, Code Formatter & Explainer, Image Caption Generator, and AI Chat Assistant.
about.essentialToolsList: Word Counter, Password Generator, QR Code Generator, JSON/CSV Converter, Image Compressor, Text to Speech, PDF to Word, Color Picker, OCR, and Unit Converter.

textEncryptor.name: Text Encryptor

textEncryptor.subtitle: Simple XOR-based encryption for text (educational purposes)
textEncryptor.securityNoticeText: This is a simple XOR cipher for educational purposes only. It should NOT be used for securing sensitive data. For real encryption needs, use industry-standard libraries like Web Crypto API or libsodium.
textEncryptor.failedToDecrypt: Failed to decrypt. Wrong password or invalid data.
textEncryptor.howItWorksIntro: This tool uses a simple XOR cipher with Base64 encoding:
textEncryptor.howItWorksStep1: Each character is XORed with the corresponding password character
textEncryptor.howItWorksStep2: The result is encoded in Base64 for safe text transmission
textEncryptor.howItWorksStep3: Decryption reverses this process using the same password
textEncryptor.rememberText: Use the same password for encryption and decryption!
